Our API  allows a flexible definition of verification scenarios based on the risk profile of the client or risk involved in the given process.

The company plans to create the next generation of personal computing tools that act as a portal for new experiences directly in a human's mind, thereby enabling individuals to upgrade their cognition.

name: MeetAnyway

extended_description: We help run engaging online conferences. Unlike Hopin or Zoom, we are super focused on connecting conference attendees with each other. Most attendees don’t actually go to watch the talks, they go for the networking. With us they can self-organize, meet and stay in touch. Usually it's incredibly hard for the organizer to build conferences which lead to key business opportunities for the attendees. We have good networking built-in.

name: Avion School
description: We teach Filipinos to become remote software engineers globally.

name: Forcyte Biotechnologies
description: Discover drugs that control how much cells "squeeze" to treat disease
extended_description:
In a nutshell: many diseases are caused by how much your cells squeeze (asthma, fibrosis, others). We discover drugs that control how much cells squeeze, with ease, to treat disease.

We use patented bioMEMS technology to turn cell strength (cells' ability to pull/ squeeze) into a quantifiable metric in drug discovery, to help find better drugs for mechanical diseases. 

We screen 100,000s of drugs against numerous contractile human cell types to comprehensively map human mechanobiology (the "contractome") and identify promising drug development starting points to deliver novel medicines to treat mechanically-driven diseases including asthma, hypertension, preterm labor, fibrosis, and others.

name: hoop.dev
description: Code review for DevOps tasks
extended_description: hoop.dev prevents developers from blocking on Devops tasks. We do this by enabling any engineer do Devops work under the supervision of the Devops team. You can think of us as code review for Devops tasks.

name: Routine
description: Most advanced calendar for busy professionals, with tasks & notes
extended_description:
Routine is on a mission to help extremely busy people stay on top of things. CEOs, entrepreneurs, investors, senior executive and general managers evolve in a very chaotic environment with hundreds of emails, chat messages, things going through their mind and important tasks that must be completed in time.

Even though a lot of tools exist, from email clients, todo and note taking apps all the way to project management platforms and physical notebooks, none of them seem to work when it comes to having an overall picture of what matters at the moment.

Routine is a personal productivity desktop/mobile app that is always at the user's fingertips through a single keyboard shortcut. It allows busy people to quickly capture thoughts, secure time in their calendar to work on important tasks, schedule meetings, take notes but also quickly glance at their calendar to know when is their next meeting.

Routine has been created in 2020 by Julien Quintard and Quentin Hocquet, serial entrepreneurs who previously founded Infinit which they sold to [Docker](http://www.docker.com) in 2016.

name: Djamo

extended_description: Djamo is a challenger Bank for consumers in french speaking Africa where less than 25% of the population is banked, we are building seamless and affordable banking solutions to break into this huge untaped market and bring millions of people into financial inclusion.

extended_description: Turing College is an online AI college for busy professionals. As a constituent college affiliated with Woolf, a higher education institution in the European Union, we bring world-class programs driven by Google-level engineers to Cambridge University PhDs.

extended_description:
HUBUC P1 is a lightning-fast global card issuing and processing engine.

We call this incredible machine P1 because it's fast, lean, and innovative.

We believe it's the best, and you should take it for a test drive here: https://www.hubuc.com/

extended_description:

We will enable enterprises to build modern apps quickly at scale, like Databricks did for data management.

extended_description: Blink provides same-day delivery to e-commerce companies, helping them acquiring and retaining more customers thanks to a great delivery experience. Merchants sell on their website and Blink picks-up orders directly from physical stores or from dark stores (small urban warehouses) deployed in cities. Crowdsourced riders and transportation companies complete the delivery following routes optimized in teal time. Consumers can track and personalize their delivery.

extended_description:
Vendease is a marketplace that lets restaurants in Africa, order directly from farms and food manufacturers.

Now, instead of going through expensive - middlemen - vendors, or wasting productive man hours sending staff to open markets with hiked prices, restaurants can now get on our platform, click to order and get all their food supplies within 24hrs.

name: Jiga

extended_description: Hardware companies use Jiga to centralize their RFQs, POs, and supplier communication in one place while automating their sourcing process. Instead of wasting hours on admin work and error-prone emails for quotes and orders, Jiga's customers get faster to market with optimal costs, quality, and lead times.

You can think of it as a hybrid of the Apple Store and WeChat Pay, with both staff and customers using their own devices to facilitate the transaction through QR codes.

name: Broad

extended_description: Broad is building global financial products that enable life without borders.

name: Estoca
description: Logistics Operating System for E-commerces in Latam
extended_description: Estoca sells warehouse management and logistics software to e-commerce in Latam. Unlike the US, in Latam most of these companies control their own warehouse and need software to increase delivery speed and reduce operational costs.

name: Recover
description: Government-funded online addiction treatment
extended_description:
Recover provides more effective and affordable addiction treatment via telemedicine. We partner with local governments to save lives and taxpayer dollars.

More than 20 million Americans struggle with addiction, but less than 10% of people who need it receive treatment. For those that do, it usually does not work - only 8% get better. Most of this treatment is funded by governments, and goes to programs that are frequently predatory, and focus more on profit than people.

We have created an effective, accessible, and affordable solution: Recover. We offer a proven approach using medication and counseling, that can improve outcomes for over 70% of patients. It reduces overdoses by 80%, death by 50%, and has years of research and application showing it works. 

Despite how effective this medication can be, most rehabs do not have medical professionals on staff. Not only does our program work better and bring medicine to addiction care, it also costs just 10% of traditional programs.

Nick founded Recover after seeing his family and friends struggle with addiction. He was raised by a drug addict, has an alcoholic brother, and lost an uncle to heroin. He saw how hard it is for people to get the treatment they need, and how ineffective existing options are. We are working to make sure that people like Nick’s family have access to best-in-class addiction treatment so they can get and stay well.

name: Navattic
description: Interactive product demos
extended_description: Navattic helps sales and marketing teams instantly create interactive product demos.

name: Mystic

extended_description: We build tools to facilitate the engineering side of machine learning. With the goal of demystifying how to build scalable ML products, we aim to enable data scientists and ML organisations with the engineering tools to build end-to-end products faster.

name: UPchieve
description: Connecting low-income HS students with free, 24/7 online tutoring
extended_description:
UPchieve is an edtech nonprofit that provides free, 24/7 online tutoring to low-income HS students. Using our app, students can request and get paired with a live volunteer in under 5 minutes. We’ve matched 100,000+ requests so far.

Right now in the US, there are 8 million low-income HS students who don’t have anyone in their home who can help them with schoolwork. UPchieve is working to change that. Our vision is simple: we want to democratize access to academic support, so that every student has an equal opportunity to attend college and achieve upward mobility.

One stop visualisation tool for CXOs, Operational heads or Zonal managers to get business insights and take real time decisions to help grow online sales.

We offer an online service of personalized language sessions with small groups of people of the same level, guided by expert language coaches that we train in our social methodology.

name: NowPay

extended_description:
NowPay, a FinTech startup founded by ex-employees of IBM, Microsoft, Orange and Amazon, is building a financial-wellness platform for employees in emerging markets. Saving, spending, budgeting and borrowing. Those are the 4 pillars of financial-wellness. NowPay aims to improve every aspect of those for employees by building products that tackle every vertical. 

NowPay enables employees to get their salaries in advance at any point in time during the month and also pay their bills instantly.  NowPay is backed by 500 Startups, Beco Capital, Endure, Plug and Play, MSA Capital, 4dx, Foundation Ventures, EFG and Beltone and has raised 3.7m USD so far.

name: Axolo

extended_description:
Enable your team to merge pull requests faster.

When using Axolo, we consider each pull request as a small independent project that will create a temporary Slack channel where all people that take a part in it will be invited. Each Github’s notifications & actions will then be sent directly to this channel.

extended_description:
Dayra makes it easy for Egyptian businesses offer Loans and virtual bank accounts to their unbanked workers and customers through their App.
For example, one of our customers an Egyptian trucking marketplace uses our API to give truck drivers an early advance on their earnings.

name: Dressd
description: Make infinite $$$ off of clothes in your closet without selling them
extended_description:
Dressd is AirBnb for clothes; a P2P clothing rental marketplace. Unlike Rent the Runway, we don’t handle any inventory or deal with cleaning the items. Our initial target market is sorority girls who can have up to 3-4 events per week that they need a new outfit/dress for. One of our core theses is that this idea couldn’t have existed at scale until now because resale apps like Depop & Poshmark paved the way for a P2P model to work after familiarizing users with the process of taking pictures of items, shipping, etc. 

Advantages to our P2P model

- Entrepreneur-led
    - Similar to Depop, most of our growth will be spearheaded by a group of “top renters”
- More variety in inventory
    - Existing rental companies like Rent the Runway own all the inventory so they're limited to the brands they buy/partner with. Since we're P2P, our users can rent any item or brand that's in someone else's closet
- Better margins
    - we don’t touch any inventory or deal with the cleaning of any items
    - Unlike Rent the Runway, we don’t handle any inventory or the cleaning of items. This means people renting out their clothing on Dressd are responsible for shipping things out & returning them in good condition

Here are some of our links!

[dressd website](https://dressd.com/stylist-waitlist)

[dressd instagram](https://www.instagram.com/shop.dressd/)

[dressd tiktok](https://vm.tiktok.com/TTPdMPYFRY/)

read about dressd in Yahoo! Finance: [https://www.yahoo.com/now/dressd-app-someplace-2-133700219.html](https://www.yahoo.com/now/dressd-app-someplace-2-133700219.html)

Here's an example: https://createvirtualsellers.com

Once we set it up, it operates on autopilot forever.

As the only end-to-end connectivity provider, Gigs offers a broad set of products and services, including premium wholesale, a hosted checkout, subscription management, payments, analytics, AI, and more. Unlike tools like Jira and Notion, our primary focus is helping software development teams spend less time coordinating across tools and roles so they have more time figuring out and building the things their users want.

name: Pagaloop
description: Pay, Get Paid and Extend Cash Flow using your Credit Card as…
extended_description:
Pagaloop helps business owners and persons in Latin America pay, get paid and extend cash flow using credit cards to finance expenses like rent, taxes, payroll and suppliers, via an extended network of relevant partnerships (federal/local governments, AMEX, HSBC, schools and universities, etc.). The Company provides a service in which a payment is made to a third party (that would typically not accept credit card as a payment method) in exchange for a fee of 4.7% (+ taxes). Additionally, Pagaloop offers payments in 3, 6, 9 or 12
months with an extremely accessible commission. All of those solutions without taking any underwriting risk, which remains at the issuer of the credit line.

name: Ziina
description: A digital wallet for the Middle East & North Africa
extended_description: Ziina is bringing the next generation of financial services to the Middle East.

name: Vue Storefront
description: Frontend Platform for eCommerce
extended_description:
Vue Storefront is a Frontend Platform (Head) for Headless commerce. Available as Open Source & Enterprise. By implementing Vue Storefront, you will improve your overall User Experience and lift up your revenues by at least 20%. 

1. Lightning Fast
We are on a mission to improve loading times for eCommerce users, especially on mobile devices. We want to make sure, that every site using Vue Storefront will load in under 2 seconds for all users across the globe. Currently, it is their weak spot:  
a) It takes, on average, 15.3 seconds to fully load a mobile page. 
b) 75% of mobile sites take longer than 10 seconds to load.  
c) 53% of mobile site visits are abandoned if it takes longer than 3 seconds to load. 

Loading times mean better User Experience and this leads to eCommerce users buying more, giving better conversion rates:  
a) Walmart found that for every 1-second improvement in page load time, conversions increased by 2%  
b) Increase of conversion % at each stage of the Customer Buying Journey at eCommerce based on 0.1s improvement based on Google Research (https://www.thinkwithgoogle.com/future-of marketing/creativity/mobile-page-speed-data/) 

2. Fast Time To Value
Vue Storefront is the glue for headless commerce,  giving merchants the ability to connect with any eCommerce backend, any CMS, or any other 3rd party service, as we provide those APIs by default in our cloud platform.  This is saving our clients thousands of development hours. 

Also, because of the Progressive Web App features that we provide, there is no need to build native iOS or Android apps - everything is available through the web. In combination with frontend components provided out of the box, it is possible to build a new eCommerce frontend within weeks, not months. 

3. Fast content adjustments  with any Headless CMS
Headless CMS is the only way to embrace omnichannel sales, and we know it. That is why the Enterprise version of Vue Storefront delivers the API-first setup of integrations with the best Headless CMSes out-of-the-box. 

It allows business users to edit the content & publish with a no-code approach

4. Fast learning curve for developers  
We use the modern tech stack that is easily adaptable by the developer community, and what is better market proof than the popularity of our Open Source Project? We are currently the 5th most popular eCommerce framework globally and the 1st Frontend eCommerce Framework globally!
https://docs.vuestorefront.io/v2/
https://www.vuestorefront.io/

Since business operations & money flow are manual, he worked 16 hours / 7 days to minimize theft. Zero time with family. We got obsessed with identifying how we can help small business owners run their business and have a life. 

Everything in Pakistan is manual, store credit, sales, purchasing inventory, cash management, tax filings, payments, etc.

This idea got us hooked as it allows us to build a large company and have a huge impact on ~30M small businesses in Pakistan that contribute 74% of the overall GDP.

We started 6 months ago, in March signed a $100m debt capital partnership, and will be launching our API in April. We already have more than 100 companies in our customer pipeline including Uber.

name: Fountain9
description: Helping food brands and retailers reduce food wastage
extended_description:
Fountain9 is a predictive inventory planning solution. We help food brands and retailers reduce food wastage and improve product availability by predicting their future inventory needs. 

Food wastage is a global problem that has both financial and environmental costs. An estimated $1.3 Bn tonnes of food is wasted every year and 7 - 15% of that is because of mismanaged inventory. 

We accurately predict future inventory imbalances which lead to out of stock situations or wastage, and also recommends best ways of minimising their impact. Our state of the art demand sensing and pricing engine takes into account several factors like historical sales trends, seasonality, holidays, markdown events and pricing changes to predict future inventory requirements and optimize prices. Predicted inventory demand is also aligned with supply side data to identify ideal suppliers and replenishment quantities that minimize chances of stock outs or inventory wastage.

name: Wyndly
description: Life's better without allergies
extended_description:
### What is Wyndly?

[Wyndly (YC W21)](https://www.wyndly.com) fixes allergies by training patients' bodies to ignore their allergy triggers. Frustrated allergy suffers come to us when they no longer want to deal with pills and sprays. We diagnose the patient’s unique allergy profile and create a personalized treatment plan to give the patient lifelong allergy relief. Specifically, Wyndly is increasing access to  sublingual immunotherapy (SLIT) for allergy care. For our patients, we're combining the convenience of telehealth and direct-to-consumer care with an exceptional patient experience that never loses the context of care.

Wyndly represents an opportunity to change allergy care forever. With 60 million Americans suffering from allergies today, and with this number doubling over the coming years, there's simply an incredible need for the convenient care Wyndly provides. 

You can read more about us in [Techcrunch](https://techcrunch.com/2021/02/12/wyndly-aims-to-bring-allergy-drops-to-the-masses/).

### The Wyndly Model 

At Wyndly, we believe that better connections lead to better care, and we’re committed to making both happen at every step of the patient journey. Our allergy practice allows our patients to work with expert providers to develop personalized treatment plans for long-term allergy relief using clinically proven therapies. From a patient’s initial consultation to their final treatment delivery, we want the Wyndly experience to be a breath of fresh air for allergy sufferers – truly effective allergy relief, simply and efficiently delivered.

Once we've conquered allergies, we're transforming the care model for every chronic condition. While transactional care for purchasing pills has flourished in telehealth, no one has gone after chronic care. Patients with chronic conditions are shuffled between providers, insurance, and more -- and they never feel heard. These patients deserve better, and we're going to give it to them. Wyndly is starting with allergies, but we'll expand into asthma, sleep apnea, and other conditions in the near future.

### Our values

**Compassion**: We approach all our patients and partners with an open mind and a genuine desire to be of service.

**Focus**: We do a few things very well, and are always clear about our boundaries and direction of travel.

**Courage**: We embrace ambiguity and discomfort because we know that’s how we grow.

**Progress**: We make something better every single day.

*It boils down to empathy and forward momentum in everything we do.*

### The team

Wyndly is proudly backed by Y Combinator and a leading group of angel investors and VCs. The founders are Dr. Manan Shah (Chief Medical Officer), an ear-nose-and-throat surgeon who’s a leading practitioner of telehealth in his specialty, and his cousin Aakash Shah (CEO), who led growth  engineering at SparkGift (acquired by Stockpile in 2016) and Parse.ly (acquired by Automattic in 2021).

description: Telehealth dietitians covered by insurance

Nourish is solving America's healthcare crisis by helping people eat better. We connect chronic condition patients with a Registered Dietitian via telehealth and get it covered by their health insurance.

We launched one year ago and already have 50+ dietitians and thousands of patients on the platform. Our patients span a wide range of nutrition-related conditions including diabetes, eating disorders, kidney disease, GI conditions, cancer, obesity / weight management, cardiovascular disease, and more.

We have millions in revenue (up 5x in 2022) and have raised significant funding from top-tier VCs including Thrive Capital, Y Combinator, Susa Ventures, Operator Partners, and Box Group. Our angel investors include world-class healthcare founders from Rightway Health, Headway, Spring Health, Alto Pharmacy, and more.

name: Lion Pose
description: Clinical skincare tested on diverse skin, now available in Sephora.

name: Pibit.ai
description: Transforming Commercial P&C Industry with LLM-Powered Document AI
extended_description: Pibit.ai is an insurtech company turns unstructured submission documents like loss runs, SOVs, applications into structured data, enrich data from third-party sources, provides a comprehensive view of information, enabling better decision-making and automation within the commercial underwriting workflow.

name: GroMo
description: App for independent agents to sell financial products in India
extended_description: GroMo (YC W21) is building India's largest financial products distribution company. GroMo has built a network of 1.2 million agents on its platform. GroMo has built a tech-enabled social commerce platform that helps agents not only improve access to better financial products for consumers, but also bridge the financial literacy gap by helping them choose the right offerings. Currently, GroMo is distributing a broad spectrum of 100+ financial products across Insurance, Investments, Credit Cards, Loans, Saving & Demat accounts, etc. from brands such as IDFC Bank, Jupiter Money, Axis Bank, Freecharge, etc.

name: ModernLoop
description: ModernLoop helps teams automate and streamline recruiting operations
extended_description:
ModernLoop helps every company automate and streamline recruiting operations to deliver the best candidate experience. In 2022, the Department of Labor estimates there is a global talent shortage of 40 million workers, and that number is expected to grow to over 85 million by 2030. In order for companies to win the war for talent, they need to provide a best-in-class candidate experience to recruit top talent, and our product aims at doing just that!

Our founders Lydia Han (CEO) and Chris Triolo (CTO) both founded ModernLoop in December of 2020 after they saw the challenges recruiting teams had when it came to coordinating hundreds of interviews across various teams, all while making sure both hiring managers and candidates had the best experience possible. After spending 15+ combined years at companies like Facebook, Slack, Brex and Salesforce, they understood what it took to enable talent teams do their best work, and are building a product to scale alongside them as they grow.

We created ModernLoop to serve companies of all sizes in every industry to help Talent teams interview candidates quicker, easier, and enhance productivity of teams as they continue their search for top talent!

name: Zerobroker
description: Broker-free shipping platform for businesses.
extended_description:
We’re building the best logistics system to empower businesses globally to automate their supply chain processes and ship all their products broker-free.

When we succeed, 7.6B people in the world will buy products cheaper!

name: Pensil
description: We help YouTube teachers in India monetize their courses

name: SigNoz
description: Open source alternative to DataDog
extended_description: SigNoz is an open source alternative to DataDog, NewRelic. We help developers monitor their applications and troubleshoot any problem.

name: PowerRouter
description: PowerRouter helps sales teams with lead routing in Salesforce
extended_description: PowerRouter helps sales teams assign leads and contacts to the right reps, instantly within Salesforce.  We provide a powerful automation engine with a drag and drop canvas to create routing rules, visually.  With actionable metrics to increase speed-to-lead and account based sales support, we make it very simple to stay on top of every lead in your Salesforce CRM.

name: Stacksi
description: Automated Answers to Security Questionnaires
extended_description:
Stacksi helps companies automate the process of answering enterprise security questionnaires so they can close deals faster and save their best engineers’ time for more strategic projects.
Salespeople, CTOs, and CEOs of fast-growing enterprise startups can upload security questionnaires into our system. If the company already has written security policies, they can upload those documents, too. From there, Stacksi parses their documents, identifies gaps in their security policies vs. standards, and helps them establish a successful security program. 
Ultimately, we will help them 1) automate completion of security questionnaires, 2) quickly get through enterprise security audits and 3) improve their security posture.

name: Hapi
description: Stocks and cryptos trading app with zero commissions and no minimums…
extended_description:
Hapi democratizes investing for consumers in Latin America.

We let anyone from 15 Latam countries easily start learning and investing in stocks, ETFs and cryptos in under 5 minutes, with no minimums and no commissions.

name: Finley
description: Streamline your debt capital raise and management
extended_description: Finley simplifies debt capital raise and management. Our software helps companies like Ramp, Arc and Parafin automate due diligence, ensure compliance, and streamline ongoing reporting with their capital providers. Our team brings experience from Goldman Sachs, Nova Credit, and Palantir Technologies, and is backed by Y Combinator and Bain Capital Ventures.

name: Spokn
description: Culture HQ for remote teams
extended_description:
Spokn brings human connection to remote work.  On Spokn, remote employees can share their voice and find connection through video and audio Stories and podcasts.  It's a more human way to share wins, swap stories about travel and pets, celebrate birthdays and more. 
 Unlike sad Zoom happy hours or awkward coffee chats, Spokn is designed for what remote employees want: an easy, async and human way to connect from afar. 

Companies like Robinhood, Udemy, 15Five, Snyk, GinkgoBioworks, Podium and more rely on Spokn to help them build a great remote culture.

name: Waypoint
description: A refreshingly simple way to send data-rich emails
extended_description:
A modern email API and platform designed for collaboration. Integrate emails into your application in minutes.

Alternative to SendGrid, MailGun, Mandrill, or Postmark.

name: MedMe Health
description: Software for pharmacies to move beyond dispensing
extended_description:
MedMe Health builds software for pharmacists to deliver paid clinical services like prescribing/adapting medications, point-of-care testing, giving vaccinations, and monitoring chronic conditions.  

Our web-based platform helps both independent pharmacies and large chains schedule appointments online, conduct virtual care, automate documentation, and flag clinical opportunities. With MedMe, our customers have increased their efficiency of clinical service delivery by 10x and increased pharmacy revenue with the same staff.

For the first time, MedMe enables integrations to traditionally locally-stored pharmacy data. Our vision is to transform today’s dispensing locations to tomorrow’s health hubs.

name: Taloflow
description: Collaborative Notebooks for Choosing the Right Cloud/IaaS/PaaS Vendors
extended_description:
Taloflow helps dev teams choose the right vendor without weeks of soul-sucking research or costly mistakes. It's a collaborative notebook for vendor evaluations connected to a mass of vendor data curated by top analysts.

Taloflow is backed by Y Combinator, YC Continuity, Wonder Ventures, and Voyager Capital.

name: Quadrant Eye
description: Breaking new ground in online eyecare.
extended_description:
Quadrant Eye is on a mission to improve eyecare access and fight preventable blindness. We're building the next generation eye exam... inside the average American home. 

Our team wants to enable patients' best and most visually rich lives. To this end, we're looking for curious and nimble minds to help us develop the world's first fully online eye exam and ultimately deliver high-quality eyecare at scale.

Some QE highlights:

🐝 We're a team of surgeons, scientists, venture partners, and hackers who mean business.
💸 Our backers include Y Combinator, Khosla Ventures, and the creator of Google Image Search.
🍥 We're a mission-driven company tackling an eye health market worth $USD137B.
🌟 Our core focus is currently the development of patentable deep tech, and our overall vision is to change eyecare for good.

name: Snazzy
description: Making clear aligners accessible and affordable in India
extended_description: Snazzy is a direct-to-consumer teledentistry platform for teeth straightening. Our goal is to democratize access to affordable and accessible clear aligner treatment. We leverage teledentistry and offer the highest quality aligners at a fraction of what others charge.

name: Lygg
description: Building New Sunscreen Ingredients
extended_description: Lygg is building new sunscreen ingredients based on lignin, a major biomaterial found in all plants. Sunscreens are greasy, eye-irritating, and have been demonstrated to damage coral reefs. All of these problems can be traced back to just one ingredient: octocrylene. We’re building a new ingredient that replaces octocrylene and solves all these problems.  We use new chemistry discovered over the past few years to extract lignin and transform it into our ingredient. After dominating the sunscreen market, we’ll use the same extraction chemistry to create hundreds of other chemicals ranging from adhesives to surfactants.

name: Howdy
description: We help US tech companies hire and manage software engineers in LATAM
extended_description:
Build your dev team in Latin America.

We create teams of LATAM developers for product companies in the US, enabling US companies to scale their engineering departments in US time zones.

Tell us the team size and skills you need and we’ll recruit and pre-vet candidates. If you love them, we’ll employ them in one of our Silicon Valley style offices in LATAM. Our offices are communities with local success managers, your local representative, making sure your team has everything they need including dev friendly perks like mentors, Macbooks, and community events. 

We include everything you need to build and retain a team of long term product stakeholders for your company. You want missionaries, not mercenaries.

There are no startup fees, no recruiting fees, no cancellation fees and no contract obligations. Just pay a weekly flat rate, cancel any time. We'll take care of  the international logistics of payroll, taxes, IP laws, and all local compliance, and meaningful local benefits.

We have class-A offices in cities across LATAM, with a focus on building developer communities in untapped markets. We get to know and attract the local tech contributors, and through community network effects and word of mouth, one great teammate turns into three! Then we provide them with everything they need so that you can extend your team’s engineering culture around the world.

name: DreamWorld
description: The game where everyone creates together
extended_description: DreamWorld is the massive game world where everyone creates together. Think Minecraft or Roblox, a platform where players create, except one immersive social world.

name: Albedo
description: Capturing the highest resolution satellite imagery
extended_description: Albedo is building a constellation of satellites that will capture both visible and thermal imagery simultaneously, at a resolution 9x higher than the best available today.  This novel dataset will enable commercial applications that, until now, have been limited due to the lack of affordability, timeliness, and spatial resolution required for the majority of imagery applications.  Our low cost approach will commoditize ultra high resolution imagery, enabling this data source to become as core to society as GPS.

name: Humaans
description: The fastest way to onboard and manage employees
extended_description:
Humaans is an HRIS system designed to help People Ops/Finance/IT teams operate collaboratively with all the best in class point solutions they want for their staff while maintaining a central record of employee data.

The goal is to automate the employee lifecycle by integrating deeply with other complementary solutions and turn complex/manual processes (e.g. onboarding, offboarding, compensation management, etc) into simple workflows.

name: authzed
description: Open Source, Google Zanzibar-inspired permissions database
extended_description:
We build the tools companies need to provide performant and scalable authorization for their applications.

We’re founded by 3 successful entrepreneurs with expertise in enterprise software, most recently as leaders at Red Hat. Jake and Joey met on the APIs team at Google in 2010. They went on to found Quay, where Jimmy joined as their first hire. Over the past decade, they’ve changed the landscape for building and deploying software.

name: Alba Orbital
description: We make satellites to image everywhere on Earth, every 15 minutes
extended_description: Alba Orbital is building the world's largest earth observation constellation, imaging everywhere on earth, every 15 minutes. We can see events within minutes such as wildfires in real time and have signed >$104m of LOIs, with both government and commercial customers paying pre-orders for imagery. To date we have launched 23 satellites into orbit (more than any other seed stage company in history), with another 2 launching in Q4 2022. We have launched a number of technology demonstration imaging satellites called Unicorns, which are the world's most advanced satellite under 1kg ever flown in orbit.

name: Atomic Industries
description: Automating the tool and die industry
extended_description: Atomic is automating tool and die making, a critical bottleneck in how goods are manufactured. Our mission is to transform the tribal knowledge of tool and die makers into software that powers new systems which are orders of magnitude more productive.

name: Gaiia
description: all-in-one operating system (OS) for telcos

name: The Third Place
description: Subscriptions for neighborhood businesses

name: Trestle Biotherapeutics
description: Bioengineered kidneys for patients with kidney failure
extended_description: We are developing an implantable therapeutic tissue that will be surgically delivered to patients suffering from end stage renal disease.  Upon implantation, this tissue will supplement the patient's renal function, eliminating their dependency on dialysis and improving their disease status. This has the potential to not only get these patients off dialysis - a significant impact for them and their families - but to greatly extend the time required before kidney transplantation is essential.

name: Serna Bio
description: Mapping the druggable transcriptome
extended_description: We develop novel therapeutics for globally relevant, diseases of high unmet medical need, by targeting the transcriptome.

name: Bristle
description: At-home oral health testing, coaching & care

name: cloud humans
description: AI-powered customer service for startups
extended_description:
cloud humans introduces claudIA, every startup's CX super agent.

ClaudIA is a GPT based bot who can answer any customer support tickets with zero tech effort and already integrated with your current flows and systems. 

With ClaudIA, you can automate 55-90% of your customer's enquiries while maintaining the same service level you are proud of. Gain efficiency, scalability and quality today.

Try it free (demo): https://en.cloudhumans.com/claudia-demo
Reach out if you have any questions: bruno@cloudhumans.com

name: Runway
description: Easier and more reliable mobile app releases for teams.

name: Atrato

extended_description: Enabling merchants and consumers to offer flexibility at the point of sale

name: Abacum
description: Helping Finance teams be 10x faster
extended_description: Abacum, is a SaaS platform, which makes is it easy for finance teams to use real-time data, generate reports and collaborate. We have been defined as the notion for finance.

name: Lovd

extended_description: Buy and sell previously Lovd goods. We'll pick up and deliver in 24 hours. Only in NYC.

name: Webiny
description: Open-source framework for building serverless applications
extended_description:
When the public cloud appeared migration was easy. Existing apps running on physical servers could just be moved to virtual machines running in the cloud. The cloud is now moving towards serverless, and serverless is not backward compatible. New tools need to be created and existing apps need to be rewritten. Webiny provides developers with everything they need to build those serverless apps.

We are a 100% remote team.

name: Degrees of Freedom
description: DoF provides a high quality, affordable higher education alternative.
extended_description: Degrees of Freedom offers a high-quality, low-cost degree, by blending virtual and traditional college models. Our students learn on-campus, and online on-line, and in-VR from diverse Ivy League professors and master teachers-- all at the cost of the Pell Grant

name: inBalance
description: Electricity price forecasts for energy storage, ev charging, etc.
extended_description: We use machine learning to accurately forecast electricity prices. Our live customers, including Enel, use our software to improve revenue by millions of dollars per year.

name: Preki

extended_description:
Preki creates easy to use e-commerce solutions for local businesses in LatAm, you can think of us as Shopify for LatAm.

Setting up an online business in LatAm is expensive, hard to learn and time consuming.

With us, all businesses have to do is follow an onboarding process and add products - no code or design involved. This process takes less than 30 seconds and users can start selling immediately.

name: Pyroscope
description: Open source continuous profiling software to debug performance issues
extended_description: Pyroscope is an open source continuous profiling platform. With just a few lines of code it will help you debug performance issues and find bottlenecks in your code.

name: Worksphere

extended_description: Worksphere helps companies manage a hybrid workplace where employees work from the office and from home. We allow employees to reserve a desk, know who will be in office, and better coordinate in-person meetings. Companies can let go of unused office space and save money.

name: Enable Us
description: All-in-one Sales and Buyer Enablement Platform
extended_description:
Enable.us is an all-in-one workspace for the B2B Sales, Marketing, and Customer facing teams to provide a personalized and interactive buying and onboarding experience to their prospective customers. Customer facing teams have everything they need in one single location to:

- Capture Video/Audio Product demos, customer references, sales decks, white-papers, contracts, onboarding material, and other content 

- Automatically organize & contextualize  (by industry, persona, deal stage, deal size)

- Build personalized deal rooms with AI-targeted content,  simplified workflows, and 1:1 communication with the prospect and other stakeholders/influencers.

Learn more about our launch here https://www.producthunt.com/posts/referenceable or sign up here  https://www.enable.us/

name: Partnered
description: The network where sales teams connect to share customer introductions.
extended_description: Partnered is the network where B2B sales teams share customer introductions. Join for free and get started in less than five minutes.

name: Trendpop
description: Discover trends as they happen
extended_description:
Trendpop is the leading analytics and insights platform for short-form video marketing. We’re on a mission to help anyone go viral on social video platforms. We’re a deeply technical team that has taken a data-first approach to this problem: our core engine has collected over a billion social video posts that are analyzed with state-of-the-art algorithms to understand the recommendation algorithms that power virality. 

Trendpop was co-founded by Yoav Zimmerman (CEO) and Jonathan (Yoni) Ben-tzur (CTO) in August 2020, raising money from YCombinator (W21) to build Trendpop and growing to profitability in 12 short months. In January 2022, Trendpop was acquired by Collab, a veteran company in the digital creator space and an official TikTok creative and marketing partner. Today, Trendpop powers the TikTok marketing programs of top major record labels in North America and is quickly expanding to new markets in the film, television, beauty, and DTC eCommerce industry. Trendpop is currently used by leading marketing and A&R professionals in the music industry (both indie and major) to help their artists go viral on TikTok and hundreds of brands and creators who consistently win on social video.

name: Verak
description: Better Business Insurance for MSMEs in India
extended_description:
Verak is now part of InsuranceDekho as of April 2023.

Verak offered next day coverage starting at ₹8 per day for MSMEs in India to insure any facility (shop, warehouse, factory etc) against 15+ natural & man-made perils. (*)

Our team worked across the entire insurance value-chain: From satellite based underwriting to machine learning based pricing to instant quotation to WhatsApp based claims.

name: Roin Technologies
description: Building robots to automate commercial concrete construction.
extended_description: We build automated robots for concrete floor construction. One person with our robots does the work of 6 construction workers.

name: Pry Financials

extended_description:
Pry makes it simple for companies to manage their budget, hiring plan, financial models, and cash runway.

Today, most people plan for their business once a quarter. It's done in Excel - buggy, boring, confusing, and really time-expensive. A lot of people have tried to solve this and only found moderate success or failed.

We're the team to do it right.

name: OctiFi
description: Buy Now Pay Later for Southeast Asia
extended_description: We empower commerce with instant 0% interest loans for responsible spenders.  Consumers can now renovate their dream homes or buy furniture online with an extended budget and pay later at no extra cost.

name: Bueno Finance

extended_description: Credit building platform for next billion users. We offer digital credit card over UPI

name: ClipDrop
description: Turn regular mobile photos into professional product visuals
extended_description:
ClipDrop is an app that turns regular mobile photos into professional product visuals.

Thanks to companies like Poshmark, Etsy and Ebay, there are now over 25M sellers who need great visuals for their shops but most of them don’t have access to a professional photographer or a design team. We replace all of this with our app available on mobile and desktop.

We’re a team of former Google, Facebook employees and Machine learning PhD’s and academic Professors. We believe that machine learning will bring professional photography and design to millions of businesses for a fraction of the cost.

name: PingPong
description: Video messaging app for remote teams.
extended_description:
A video messaging app for remote teams in multiple time zones—it's like Slack for video.

With PingPong, teams collaborate by exchanging short video, voice, and screen recording clips.

name: Furmacy

extended_description: Boitas.com is a B2B Food Service platform that makes easy for restaurants, hotels and cafeterias to order the supplies they need all in one place using their mobile phones or computers.

name: Outfit

extended_description:
We sell DIY home renovations in a box.

We format our architect-designed templates to a customer's space. We then buy all the materials needed on their behalf, and ship it to their door for them to build.

The experience is accompanied by an app that guides from start-to-completion of the project.

name: Mezli
description: Autonomous restaurants that make great, affordable meals.
extended_description:
At Mezli, we're building "auto-kitchens", fully autonomous shipping-container restaurants that serve great, affordable meals for takeout and delivery.

While at Stanford, the three of us got fed up with having to either cook every day or spend $10 or more for healthy options like Chipotle, Sweetgreen, etc. So, we decided to democratize access to healthy, convenient food by building Mezli.

name: Prendea
description: Live afterschool classes for Spanish-speaking kids ages 4 to 15.
extended_description: Prendea offers live afterschool classes to Spanish-speaking kids ages 4 to 15.  For a fixed monthly price, kids can choose as many classes as they like from our large selection that ranges from TikTok choreography to astronomy.

name: Codeball
description: AI-Powered Code Review
extended_description: Codeball finds bugs in your Pull Requests, lets you ship faster and with higher confidence. The Codeball AI is trained on millions of code contributions to recognise risky code changes.

name: Fable
description: The command center for product teams
extended_description: Fable is a command center for product teams - we're building for PMs what Figma has done for designers and Linear for engineers. Product teams are acting on stale information. Fable is the place that keeps everything - from specs to decisions - fresh.

name: Mythia
description: Find profitable NFTs early

name: Taste

extended_description: Taste is an online marketplace where you can order ready-to-eat dinners from great restaurants, shipped nationwide. The next time you want to have a nice dinner at home, instead of cooking for hours or getting low quality take out, you can order a nice multi-course dinner from Taste to enjoy with friends or loved ones.

name: MarcoPolo

extended_description: Marketplace for US companies to source products from LatAm manufacturers

Using our solution, companies see onboarding speed increase by 5x and costs reduce by >80%.

name: Lalabox
description: Live stream shopping for beauty products

name: YourQuote

extended_description: YourQuote is a social writing app that helps regular people share their short-form creative writing. Much like how Instagram has turned each one of us into a photographer, YourQuote has turned 2.5 million people in India into amateur writers.

name: Charge Running
description: Provides live, virtual running classes to runners all around the world
extended_description:
Charge Running is a community for all runners. We host 20+ live virtual running classes and races per day, where runners join and run together from all over the world through a mobile app. Each class is hosted by a live, certified run coach, that tracks all participants' distances, paces, cadences, and interval summaries as they lead the runners via audio through effort-based run classes.

Each runner can chat with the coach and other participants of the run, as well as see in real-time the distance of every other runner, no matter where they run from. This creates an incredibly motivational experience. 

In addition to our daily lineup of classes, Charge hosts virtual races, partnering with race directors and charities to offer a virtual racing experience, with an in-person feel.

name: noHQ
description: International contractor and multi country payroll
extended_description: noHQ allows you to set up legal entities around the world, and compliantly hire and pay your international team.

name: Finary

extended_description: Finary makes investing social by bringing together your portfolio and friends. Chat, hangout, and collaborate on investments.

name: GoBuild (fka Brick)
description: The payments solution for small scale construction.
extended_description:
We're building the trusted payments solution that enables small scale construction companies to grow. We help our customers grow by removing the cashflow strains of slow payments, mainly by:
- Increasing volume of jobs by offering standardized, low-cost initial deposit options for - customers,
- Improving productivity through consistent access to project-based working capital,
- Improving expense management by streamlining their subcontractor payout process, and
- Removing client collections risk from the construction company

name: Krab

extended_description: A lending platform that enables truckers/trucking companies with no formal credit score to access loans from banks. Our platform creates a rich credit profile of a trucking company by pulling 200+ data points from varied sources via consent APIs and instantly offers loans from multiple banking partners in less than 60 seconds. The trucking company can also use the same product for order management, invoice generation, vendor payments, and collections.

name: Observa
