Visit www.ezdubs.ai to try out our Chrome extension and our Twitter bot for dubbing YouTube and Twitter videos with a single click, or reach out to us to integrate EzDubs' APIs with your website / livestreaming stack.

name: GradientJ
description: Platform to build large language model applications
extended_description:
GradientJ helps teams deploy large language models at scale. Companies use us to build GPT-4 powered APIs that process millions of job applications per year.

Our app provides tools to build and compare prompts, track live performance, and continuously improve models from human feedback, including automated model comparison across LLM providers and open source alternatives.

name: Inkeep
description: AI search and support copilots for developer products
extended_description: Inkeep makes it easy to turn docs, GitHub issues, and other content into AI-powered search and chat copilots for developer products. 100+ teams use Inkeep to activate and retain users, reduce support loads, and understand what users are asking for.

name: Plutis
description: On-demand, modern-day mental healthcare.
extended_description: Plutis is a mental health platform that tailors itself to your unique mental health journey. Connect with providers who specialize in the challenges you are facing, access real-time AI-based coaching on your specific context and needs, and discover new services to advance your mental fitness.

name: Momentum Foods
description: Adding meat back into plant-based meat.
extended_description:
Momentum Foods is adding meat back into plant-based meat to make it both more affordable and indistinguishable from actual meat. The company was founded by Stanford mechanical engineers Saba Fazeli and Brice Klein:

-Saba was the first R&D engineer at Beyond Meat where he developed and scaled all of their textured proteins.
-Brice was the fourth engineer at vertical farming company Plenty where he led the commissioning of their new, multi-million dollar farm. 

In the past three months they’ve created two proprietary textured proteins, developed three market-ready products, and are on track to launch their retail brand, Paul’s Table, in Summer 2023.

name: Ruuf
description: Managed marketplace for solar in Latam
extended_description: We offer no-money-down installations that generate free money for homeowners from day one. We are digitalizing the whole process of going solar. Instead of using traditional forms and leaving it up to customers to fill them, we use technology to take all that burden off our customers plate. We only ask for an address and offer free instant quotes.

name: OpenMeter
description: Usage Metering for AI, DevOps & Billing
extended_description:
WHAT IS OPENMETER?

OpenMeter is built for engineers to help meter data-intensive AI and DevOps applications customer usage for billing, product, and analytics use cases.

HOW DO WE HELP?

We help engineers by eliminating the heavy lifting of real-time and accurate metering for AI, API, and DevOps applications. We enable billing, product, and analytics use cases for the next generation of data-intensive applications. Usage-based pricing with per-second granularity, per API, or token usage is streamlined with OpenMeter.

name: Propify
description: Plaid for Commercial Real Estate
extended_description: Propify lets engineers build, test, and launch CRE software integrations in days, not months. We modernize the developer experience for our customers, providing clear documentation and robust infrastructure to support the needs of property owners, property managers, & proptechs.

name: Iliad
description: Creative tool for generating game assets using AI
extended_description: Iliad is a creative tool for generating concept art, 2D, and 3D game assets using AI. It lets designers step through and edit the evolution of assets they’re generating so they have fine control over the final output.  We call this new AI-assisted creative technique “mid-generation editing”.

name: Squack
description: Natural language RPA tools for accountants
extended_description: Squack gives accounting firms a RPA tool that uses LLMs to create complex automations using natural language. For example, an accountant can use Squack to create a workflow that automatically categorizes bank transactions just by writing a few sentences.

name: Floworks
description: Close more deals with CRM on Slack
extended_description:
Floworks helps sales teams close more deals and stay on top of leads by letting reps send CRM updates, schedule follow-ups, send emails, get reports- all from Slack. 

For example, after a sales meeting, a rep can directly post notes and schedule follow ups		by just going to Slack and instructing Floworks in plain english- instead of painstakingly navigating through multiple applications.

name: Extend
description: AI-Powered Workflows for Unstructured Data
extended_description: Intelligent data extraction and automation tools built for modern enterprises. We're growing quickly and hiring!

name: Langfuse
description: Open source observability & analytics for LLM apps
extended_description:
Langfuse is building open-source observability and analytics  for LLM apps.

Observability: Explore and debug complex logs & traces in a visual UI.

Analytics: Improve performance of LLM apps. In particular, get a view on costs, latency and response quality using intuitive dashboards.

name: Finex
description: Finex is a single platform for all e-commerce finances.
extended_description: We help e-commerce businesses streamline their financial operations by offering a bank account, domestic and international transfers, credit cards, and financial data from all popular e-commerce services.

name: Outerbase
description: The interface for your database
extended_description: Outerbase is the interface for your database. Companies use Outerbase to view, edit, and modify their data and even generate beautiful visual dashboards without having to write a single line of SQL.

name: Anarchy
description: LLM infrastructure for conversational UI
extended_description: Anarchy provides open-source infrastructure for building conversational UIs with any LLM.

name: Bluedot
description: Bluedot is a single payment platform for EV drivers and fleets.
extended_description:
Bluedot makes EV charging payment easier and simplifies expense management for drivers and fleets. They're growing 40-45% weekly and made $110K GMV last week.

Over 50% of vehicles sold will be electric by 2030. The payments management infrastructure for EV charging and the expenses doesn’t exist at the moment. The founders operated 100+ EV charging stations, worked in companies like Zipcar, Bosch, and Mercedes, and faced this problem through their own experiences. They built a team with a strong fintech background and publicly launched their Bluedot card on Dec 14th, 2022.

Bluedot has raised their pre-seed from Y Combinator, Axel Springer, Porsche, Ford, TechNexus, DRF, and Pritchard Automotive.

name: Dream3D
description: AI-powered 3D Design
extended_description: Dream3D is an AI-powered 3D design tool that makes it easy to create studio-quality computer graphics.

name: Intently
description: Helping sales teams automatically identify the best targets using AI
extended_description:
Intently is a platform that gives you intent data for your prospects when they are interested in buying your product. You can reach out to high-level leads at the right time every time.

Intently leverages AI algorithms to analyze a wealth of data - from social media presence to digital footprints, to pinpoint prospects with buying intent signals relevant to your offering. Think of us as the Google of people search: tell us who you want to target, and we'll provide a ranked list of prospects based on their likelihood of buying. We complete each profile with valuable data to help you understand their needs and craft tailored proposals. Our intent-mining solutions free your marketing and sales teams from time-consuming manual searches, allowing them to build a faster-converting pipeline and focus on closing deals.

Key features: 

- List of decision makers that are interested in purchasing your product
- Regular intent data updates
- Auto-generated outbound messages

name: Kivo Health
description: Telehealth lung rehab
extended_description: Kivo Health provides telehealth rehab for chronic lung disease patients. We offer an 8-week clinical program led by a live therapist, which saves payers $6,000 per patient. Only 3% of eligible patients are getting this life-changing therapy right now.

name: coil
description: Pay-by-bank for subscriptions
extended_description: We help merchants seamlessly accept bank payments to reduce processing fees and churn.

name: Haven
description: AI-powered front desk for property managers.
extended_description: Haven is an AI-powered front desk for property managers. Our software allows property managers to automate up to 50% of resident interactions, allowing them to scale their portfolio profitably.

name: Suger
description: Salesforce for Cloud marketplaces on AWS, Azure, GCP
extended_description: The cloud marketplaces on AWS, Azure, and GCP have become the App Store for B2B software products. It’s growing close to 100% year-over-year since it gives software sellers access to cloud budgets and makes procurement 40% faster. The core problem is the cloud marketplace is hard to navigate and requires an upfront technical investment without knowing the expected ROI. Suger eliminates the need to reinvent the wheel with your own engineering resource or spend a fortune on consulting-based solutions.

name: Frigade
description: Build better product  onboarding, faster.
extended_description: React SDK to add quality tours, checklists, and announcements to your product. It comes with beautiful web components and APIs.

name: 0pass
description: We help organizations go passwordless.
extended_description:
90% of security breaches are caused by a simple employee mistake. 

Your employee gets a bad link, clicks an email, then types in their password, and maybe even their two-factor code - because it looks just like the normal company login page!

Attackers have proven that your MFA is not enough. 0pass allows you to completely circumvent these basic risks by switching to a passwordless login that can't be stolen.

Founded by cybersecurity leaders from SpaceX, AWS, and Blue Origin - we're building security tools that solve the biggest problems, without headaches for your employees.

name: Polo
description: Dynamic menus, order, and pay for LatAm restaurants and coffee shops
extended_description:
PoloPay leverages behavioral data to help restaurants, hotels, and social clubs enhance their guest experience. 

By using unique QR codes at tables and rooms, guests can easily browse, order and pay for food, drinks and services, while the establishment benefits from valuable insights and analytics, enabling them to make data-driven decisions.

Our goal is to support the hospitality industry through network benefits, data-centered products, and fostering a cohesive ecosystem as we grow. We love to rethink and break stuff to build beautiful experiences.

name: Cloudchipr
description: Workflow Automation for Cloud Operations
extended_description: Cloudchipr helps engineering and finance teams save time and money by automating cloud operations. With Cloudchipr, teams can schedule different automated workflows that send Slack alerts, build Tableau charts, create Jira tickets, and deactivate unused resources across all major cloud platforms. It’s like Zapier for cloud ops.

name: Athina AI
description: Evaluation and Monitoring Platform for LLM Apps
extended_description:
Athina is an evaluation platform to monitor your LLM apps in production. We run automated evals to detect and tag bad outputs, hallucinations and other quality errors in your LLM responses.

Evals are plug and play, but can be customized and configured for your use case. 

Examples: hallucination detection, summarization accuracy, conversational insights, PII leaks, bias detection, language mismatch, answer relevance, harmful language, etc

Evals automatically run against your production outputs to help you quantify your app's performance and improve the quality of your responses.

Athina also generate insights about your AI-powered conversations to help you understand and measure your user's satisfaction and detect which conversations are ending badly.

name: Chart
description: Communication Intelligence for Financial Compliance
extended_description: Chart specializes in communication intelligence using Large Language Models (LLMs). We systematically analyze internal and customer-facing communications, including voice calls, emails, and Slack messages. Our platform is versatile, catering to various industries, but our present focus is on the financial sector, emphasizing compliance monitoring and QA analysis. Beyond analysis, we provide tools to manage alerts, construct communication graphs, and more. All these operations are securely conducted within the client's cloud environment, be it AWS or GCP, with our SaaS platform handling the technical intricacies.

name: Bujeti
description: Corporate cards and expenses management platform for African…
extended_description: Bujeti is a corporate cards and expenses management platform for African businesses. We help African businesses issue corporate cards to their employees, control and manage their expenses and keep track of their finances.

name: Index
description: Collaborative planning for high-growth technology companies
extended_description: Index is a product planning tool that gives you one place to track ideas and turn them into plans across your entire company

name: Cosine
description: Your AI Co-developer
extended_description: Cosine understands your codebase better than you do. It supports 50+ coding languages, allowing developers to ask any question about their codebase, get explanations about any feature and get suggestions about how to write new code.

name: Flower
description: Train AI on distributed data
extended_description: Flower is an open-source framework for training AI on distributed data using federated learning. Companies like Banking Circle, Nokia, Porsche, and Brave use Flower to easily improve their AI models on sensitive data that is distributed across organizational silos or user devices. Almost all AI today is based on centralized public data — a small fraction of the data we have; we believe that training on orders of magnitude more data will unlock the next leaps in AI.

name: Pirros
description: Github for Construction
extended_description: Engineers and Architects end up redesigning hundreds of details a year just because they are unable to search through all their past details. Pirros allows designers to effectively search all their past project details so that they can find quality starting points rather than redesigning from scratch.

name: LinkGrep
description: AI browser copilot for teams
extended_description:
Modern teams work in the browser. But browsers weren't built for teams 😔. 

This leads to a bunch of problems like:
- Knowledge/info that is hard to find (links that get lost, documentation that gets, buried, silos, etc)
- Poor collaboration
- Inefficient workflows

LinkGrep is an AI browser copilot that solves those problems by making your browser team friendly.

Specifically we help teams:
1. 🔗 Keep track of links, documents, and more automatically. With LinkGrep you'll never have to manually add or save a link.
2. 🔍 Find information that matters. LinkGrep connects with your existing tools like Notion and Slack and will automatically suggest relevant information to you as your browse (we have semantic search that you can fallback on). Demo: https://youtu.be/jwcPGDRy4oQ
3. 👥 Collaborate better. LinkGrep lets you leave notes and comments directly on web pages — you won't ever have to copy paste a link into Slack ever again. 
4. 🤖 Automate team actions like opening up the right links before a meeting. Never disrupt a meeting to send a link again. Demo: https://youtu.be/an3VKpAWft0

name: Bluebirds
description: Resell to past customers who switched jobs
extended_description: Bluebirds helps outbound teams resell to past customers who switched jobs. Any rep, manager, or rev ops can sign up on the website and Bluebirds will automatically identify champions using Machine Learning, detect job changes, and deliver hundreds of warm leads.

name: Trigo
description: Rent data API for landlords and lenders
extended_description:
Trigo aggregates consumer rent history to help landlords approve better tenants and lenders write more loans. No solution exists to consistently furnish this data to landlords and lenders today. The largest database has only 3% coverage of rent data.

Trigo is a Consumer Reporting Agency (CRA) that provides this missing rent data set through a real-time API and web application. We are repeat founders with consumer data and finance experience across Harvard, Citigroup, Experian, and Amazon.

name: Neptyne
description: The programmable spreadsheet.
extended_description:
Neptyne is the first natively programmable spreadsheet, with a full Python environment, just like a Jupyter notebook. And we built in AI to make it easy to use, even if you’re not a Python expert. Neptyne turns anyone who can use Excel into a programmer.

At Google, Douwe launched products to millions in Search, Mobile and workplace. He founded multiple startups, and published a book on deep learning. 4 years ago Douwe rejoined Google, where he met his cofounder Jack and the rest of the team.

Neptyne launched on Hacker News in February 2023, and since then users have made thousands of spreadsheets.  People have built everything from option trading systems to machine learning classifiers using Neptyne.

name: Scanbase
description: The API for Diagnostic Test Analysis (COVID-19, FLU, RSV, STD,…
extended_description: Scanbase makes it easy for medical companies to convert photos of rapid diagnostic tests into results. We do this by providing a simple API that any medical company can access.

name: Vooma
description: Backoffice automation platform for logistics
extended_description:
Vooma is a back-office automation platform for freight brokers and carriers that fully automates order taking from shippers. We help logistics companies focus on work that drives business value.

Mike built self driving trucks as a founding engineer at Kodiak Robotics (prev. Uber, Otto) and led their motion planning and safety teams. Jesse grew a private equity backed logistics software company from $2M to $20M+ as CEO.

name: CreatorML
description: ML-Powered Predictive Analytics for YouTube Creators
extended_description: CreatorML uses ML to predict views for YouTube content creators. Our in-house ML predicts which topics, titles, and thumbnails will resonate best with audiences to maximize views and ROI for many of the world's biggest YouTubers.

name: Coperniq
description: Workflow software for solar & energy contractors ☀️😎
extended_description:
Coperniq is workflow software for solar & energy contractors.

It cuts soft cost per installation by $3K (17% of total cost) & accelerates project completion by 45 days (30% of project timeline).

We replace Salesforce, spreadsheets, pencil-&-paper, & other hacky workarounds with an industry-specific application for the underserved energy workforce. 

Main benefits for our customers 
1. Finish projects faster and cheaper: Our platform cuts 17% of soft costs, allowing contractors to deploy more projects, faster, and cheaper, with 5-star customer experience every time
2. Turn costly (often unprofitable) service calls into a revenue engine: By integrating with hardware OEMs (Enphase, SolarEdge, etc...), Coperniq gives you real-time health checks for your install base, automates service tickets, & drives referral revenue

Coperniq does all this and much more in one beautiful platform!

Are you or someone you know running or thinking about starting a solar company? [Schedule a call with us :)](https://calendly.com/coperniq-sales/discovery-web-v2 )

name: Zenfetch
description: AI-powered memory assistant
extended_description:
The average knowledge worker consumes 34 gigabytes of information every day — equivalent to reading the Hobbit every day. However, 90% of this information is forgotten by the end of the week. Zenfetch is on a mission to help knowledge workers retain and activate this forgotten 90%. 

The founders, Gabe and Akash, met at Johns Hopkins where they built their first startup together. Before Zenfetch, Akash was one of the youngest product managers at Meta while Gabe was the founding ML engineer on Stripe's financial crimes team.

name: PoplarML
description: Deploy Machine Learning Models with One Command
extended_description: PoplarML lets you deploy any machine learning model to a fleet of GPUs as a ready-to-use and scalable API endpoint with one command.

name: LaunchFlow
description: Unlock Cloud Computing in your Code Editor
extended_description:
Modern backend development is slow, tedious, and requires constant switches between multiple interfaces. Developers that use LaunchFlow are capable of building and deploying end-to-end, scalable backends in a matter of seconds. 

Our VSCode extension and managed serverless runtime automate all of the operational tasks that have historically been required to create a large scale system, and gives developers a single interface for interacting with all of their external dependencies.

name: FlexWash
description: The operating system for the car wash industry.
extended_description: Car washing is a $15B market in dire need of disruption. Legacy systems are costly, out of date, and inflexible. We are building modern solutions to help car wash operators manage and grow their business.

name: Gluetrail
description: Build apps in no-code on top of your business systems
extended_description: Gluetrail is a no-code platform for building business critical apps and workflows. With Gluetrail, Operations teams autonomously create and deploy custom internal applications on top of their business systems, such as partner & customers portals, internal tools and workflow automations.

name: JustPaid.io
description: AI-powered automation invoicing and bill pay
extended_description:
JustPaid.io is the AI-powered financial automation invoicing and bill pay you wish you had earlier.

Our AI-powered financial app automates invoicing and bill pay. 

Collect from customers on time, pay bills on time. 

Using Stripe? Using Quickbooks, Bill.com or Brex? We plug right in and make things simple. 

------

We are always asking ourselves, how can we make a company's team's life easier to help them scale through financial technology?

- We don’t settle.
- We are passionate.
- We are serial entrepreneurs.

Join us and help us make a dent in the universe - https://www.justpaid.io/career

name: OfOne
description: AI-powered order taker for restaurant drive-thrus
extended_description:
OfOne is building software to automate order taking at fast-food drive-thrus. Using conversational AI, we can save the typical restaurant owner $60,000 in labor costs per store annually. 

OfOne can answer questions, intelligently upsell - like suggesting ice cream on a hot day - and always says please and thank you.

There are 200,000 drive-thrus in the US and they are the industry's largest order channel.

Our mission is to deliver human centric experiences that help restaurant operators prosper, deliver delight for their customers, and empower their workers.

name: Narrative
description: Bill.com for logistics
extended_description: We use AI to catch errors in invoices and facilitate payments between large companies and their logistics providers.

name: Omnistrate
description: Transform any software to multi-cloud SaaS in minutes not years
extended_description:
Omnistrate is a cloud platform to SaaS-ify your docker image in minutes instead of years.

Let’s say you have an open-source software, and you want to monetize your invention by building a multi-cloud SaaS solution. You can either spend years doing it yourself or use Omnistrate to do it in no time.

name: Feather
description: The Bloomberg Terminal for retail traders.
extended_description:
Founded in December 2022, Feather is the first integrated, one-stop solution for retail traders to analyze any investment, anywhere in the world. Feather covers all major asset classes and geographies, from equities, options, and bonds to commodities, currencies, and macroeconomies. Feather also provides data on 11,000 institutions (holdings, transactions, etc.) and 10,000 individuals (insider purchases/sales, transaction histories, etc.).

Feather’s pricing starts at just $39 per month, empowering customers to make informed, wealth-building investments with data available only to Wall Street until now. Visit us at https://try-feather.com.

name: Tennr
description: Custom LLMs for Business
extended_description: Tennr makes it easy for non-technical teammates to build, launch and monitor advanced custom large language models that improve their product or team's workflows.

name: Cakework
description: API that adds cloud hosting to any developer platform
extended_description: We make it possible to build a serverless cloud platform that hosts custom user code with just APIs and no infrastructure team. For example, an open source framework can build a cloud offering that deploys their users code from Github or local dev environments in days instead of months.

name: EdgeBit
description: Security platform to prevent useless supply chain investigation
extended_description:
Dependencies for software products are exploding in number and with that comes a sprawling supply chain. A supply chain isn't just a build-time check, it's highly dynamic. EdgeBit watches in real time – we cross-reference your build pipelines and server fleet with multiple data sources to communicate your live inventory and actual risk.

Security teams aren’t experts at their company’s apps, so they are forced to distract the most skilled engineers with a firehose of vulnerabilities to investigate. We founded EdgeBit because we believe that we can solve this problem — to empower security teams to prioritize investigation of true risks without wasting engineers time.

name: Salient
description: AI Servicing for Auto Lenders
extended_description: Salient is an AI workflow automation tool for lenders. We're working with the largest auto lenders in America and are hiring!

name: ZeroDev
description: Account abstraction wallets as a service
extended_description:
Use ZeroDev to create self-custody wallets for your users, powered by account abstraction.  These wallets are truly non-custodial, while being easier to use and way more powerful than even custodial wallets, enabling features such as:

- Gas-free transactions
- Transaction bundling
- Programmable security policies

ZeroDev is perfect for anyone who wants to create wallets for users, including Web 2.5 apps, wallet apps, onramps, marketplaces, and more!

name: Ruby Card
description: Neobank for e-commerce businesses
extended_description:
Ruby is a neobank that offers e-commerce businesses a flexible spend management solution and direct integrations with commerce platforms. 

By combining banking and commerce data, Ruby provides businesses with a real-time, unified view of their financial health and money movement, empowering them to make better financial decisions and scale their operations.

name: Pledge Health
description: Automated patient billing for independent healthcare clinics
extended_description: Pledge automates patient billing for independent healthcare clinics. We estimate how much insurance will cover for each visit, so clinics can charge patients at the time of service, rather than waiting weeks for insurance to process.

name: Mirio
description: The Storytelling Platform for API Products
extended_description:
Mirio is an all-in-one storytelling platform for API go-to-market teams.

Go-to-market teams struggle to show the full potential of API products. Buyers don't just want to look at documentation, they want to see what an API enables. However, building interactive demos takes hours of custom engineering work.

With Mirio, sales team teams can create personalized demos that speak to both technical and non-technical buyers. Marketing teams can educate prospects using shareable presentations with built-in analytics. Solutions teams can scale their operations by building re-usable demo templates in minutes, without code.

name: Glass Health
description: AI-Powered Clinical Decision Support
extended_description: We empower clinicians with our AI platform for developing differential diagnoses and drafting clinical plans.

name: Double
description: Background research on sales prospects by searching the web with LLMs
extended_description:
Double makes it easy for sales teams to answer very specific questions about their prospects, the kind that ZoomInfo can't answer.

We do this by searching the web and using LLMs to compile verifiable answers with citations.

We can answer questions like:
- Is this a remote-first company?
- Do they offer customer support via Slack?
- Is their primary product an API?
- Is this a law firm that specializes in personal injury?
- And anything else you can think of

name: Byterat
description: Benchling for battery companies
extended_description: Byterat is a cloud platform for battery R&D teams that lets them manage and analyze all their battery data in one place. Byterat directly integrates with lab hardware, pulls data into one dashboard and analyzes it to unlock hidden insights connecting design to performance.

name: Pair AI
description: Reimagining education with short form video and AI
extended_description: Pair AI is Shopify for knowledge products. We empower creators, educators, and experts to launch addicting mobile-first video courses and provide AI-assisted coaching services at scale. Our platform is a one-stop shop to seamlessly monetize what you know! We make learning as fun and engaging as watching a TikTok.

name: Mercoa
description: Mercoa is the Accounts Payable API for B2B Fintechs
extended_description: Mercoa let’s B2B platforms offer BillPay and Accounts Payable services to their customers. Use our drop-in iframe or API to offer your users one place to manage and pay all of their invoices.

name: Numeral
description: Ecommerce sales tax on autopilot.
extended_description: Numeral handles all aspects of sales tax from registration to remittance for e-commerce stores. We offer white-glove service so stores can get back to working on growing their business.

extended_description: Rubber Ducky Labs builds operational analytics for recommender systems. We build tools to debug, analyze, and improve recommender systems, allowing machine learning teams to move faster on projects that have a direct impact on the company's bottom line.

name: Nango
description: Open unified API for all you integrations
extended_description:
Customers expect your SaaS to integrate with their ever-growing stack.

Use an open unified API to ship integrations fast, with a single interface, for any integrations use case imaginable.

name: Parabolic
description: AI assistant for customer support
extended_description:
Parabolic is an AI assistant that autodrafts ready-to-send responses for your customer support team. 

Equip your team with the best possible response at their fingertips.

name: Palomma
description: Frictionless Account to Account (A2A) Payments for LatAm
extended_description: Palomma helps online merchants & apps in LatAm save money on card fees & increase conversions, by allowing customers (individuals or businesses) to pay directly from their bank at checkout without friction (1-3 steps)

name: CodeComplete

extended_description: CodeComplete is Github Copilot for Enterprise. Large companies can't use Copilot because of the security and privacy risks, so we're building a self-hosted version that's also fine-tuned to the company's codebase.

name: Brewit

extended_description: Brewit enables business users to generate database queries through natural language, assisting them in making better data-driven decisions.

name: Hammr
description: Rippling for the Construction Industry
extended_description:
Hammr is the all-in-one platform for construction companies to manage their back office. Top contractors use Hammr for time tracking, payroll, benefits and compliance — in one place.

In the last 12 weeks: We've already built time tracking, payroll, and job costing and have $2,000 in MRR. Doubling every month.

name: Coaster
description: Discover your next adventure
extended_description: Coaster is a marketplace for adventure travel. We've curated a collection of the best guided outdoor experiences to make it easy to plan your next trip.

name: Trackstar

extended_description: Trackstar is the Plaid for supply chain logistics. Our universal API provides a simple and well-documented way for companies to integrate with hundreds of warehouse management systems in minutes, not months.

name: Nebula
description: Code-level observability and debugging for large enterprises
extended_description:
Nebula is a code-level observability & debugging platform for large enterprises. When something goes wrong, it lets developers inspect any variable or function to see what data it contains in production and how it’s being used across their codebase. We make it easy to identify & fix production issues in massive codebases. 

85% of enterprise-scale businesses use a microservice architecture. We've talked to dozens of teams about their approach to developer productivity and heard from best-in-class companies like Netflix and Linkedin who invested in making their distributed system easier to navigate & debug. We're combining their most effective strategies with insights from Shanelle's experience at Google to increase dev velocity in complex, enterprise codebases.

name: FlexDesk
description: Helping companies book and manage their spend on coworking space.
extended_description:
Companies use FlexDesk to book, manage, and track their spend on coworking space.

FlexDesk provides employees with a booking interface to search and rent across a worldwide network of 7,000 coworking spaces. For employers, FlexDesk makes it easy to track the spend, configure policies, and streamline billing across all employees, geos, & brands.

The solution is soon expanding for companies to use FlexDesk as the OS to streamline their entire scope of office-related spend and management.

name: Dashdive

extended_description: Dashdive attributes AI and cloud costs costs to customers, teams and products at the endpoint invocation level using observability tools. This allows software companies to optimize their pricing and evaluate the profitability of each product.

name: Pyq AI

extended_description:
We make it easy for companies to build their own customized, task-specific and reliable AI models.

The resulting LLMs are more accurate, faster and cheaper to use than off-the-shelf solutions.

You always own your own model, and can run it in your own cloud or ours.

name: Backdrop
description: Vertical SaaS for the $650B+ Film, TV, and Music Production Industry
extended_description: We are starting out with our global expense management software for the entertainment industry, which still rely on spreadsheets and paper receipts to manage the $650B+ they spend each year.

name: Latent

extended_description:
At Latent, we're building medical language models to tackle the trillions of operational overhead weighing down healthcare. Our flagship product streamlines authorizations for life-saving drugs by analyzing EHR records and surfacing the most relevant data.

We've built our product and signed enterprise contracts with some of the largest health systems in the US.

name: Concourse
description: AI-powered treasury management for global companies

name: Viddy
description: E-commerce shopping experiences for paid social ads.
extended_description: Viddy creates e-commerce shopping experiences that convert paid social ads better than Shopify websites. Our 8-figure clients have increased ROAS by 30% and decreased CAC by 20%.

name: Lume
description: Automate custom data integrations with AI
extended_description: Lume is an AI tool to generate and maintain custom data integrations. Lume uses AI to automatically transform data between any start and end schema, and pipes the data directly to your desired destination.

name: SelectIQ

extended_description: SelectIQ helps clinical trial sites get faster and higher quality referrals from their physicians by automatically matching the physician's existing patients to ongoing trials.

name: Pigeon
description: Document collection made fast, easy, and secure
extended_description: Pigeon makes it easy for businesses to collect documents from their clients. Instead of having to make client portal accounts or create new Dropbox folders every time you need documents, with Pigeon you can send an itemized upload checklist in a few clicks.

name: Paperplane
description: Update Salesforce automatically using NLP
extended_description: Paperplane updates Salesforce automatically after each sales call. With us, sales leaders no longer spend 30-50% of their week piecing together what’s going on in their pipeline and can spend that time winning more deals

name: Depot
description: Build Docker containers 20x faster
extended_description:
Depot builds Docker containers up to 20 times faster. Companies like PostHog, Better Stack, Appsmith, and Novu use Depot to save tens of hours of build time every day. 

Kyle and Jacob worked together as staff engineers for the past 4.5 years at Thorn and Era Software. Depot is their solution to the wildly inefficient container build tooling they encountered throughout their careers.

name: Rollstack
description: Automatically create and update slide decks and documents
extended_description:
Who hasn't spent hours creating or updating slide decks and documents with the latest data? Teams spend between 5h and 12h per week updating slides and docs. And in 75% of the cases, slides are reused.

• Rollstack allows teams to automatically create and update Google slides and PowerPoint presentations with the latest data from their BI tools, CRMs, and data warehouse. 

• Rollstack helps teams automate their business reviews, financial reporting, and client presentations by scheduling updates, creating decks programmatically, and version control.

• Rollstack also generates insights automatically from your visualizations and datasets.

name: Magic Patterns
description: Generate UI from a simple text prompt
extended_description: Generate UI from a simple text prompt. Startups and large companies use Magic Patterns to speed up their frontend development and design process. We support generating UI from your company's custom design system and component library. Feel free to reach out: alex@magicpatterns.com

name: Credal.ai
description: The safest way to use AI at the enterprise
extended_description:
Credal protects your sensitive data across all AI apps. We ensure everyone at your company can get the benefits of AI like ChatGPT, without risking business secrets or protected data like PII making it into AI training. Think "Okta for AI".

Credal gives you four layers of security:
1. Automatic redaction, anonymisation, or user warnings when sensitive data is about to be sent off network
2. Our Secure Chat UI and APIs provide audit logs on every interaction with external AI, allowing you to see what data has been shared with which providers and what Terms of Service or MSA's govern each one.
3. We provide a wrapper around all the major providers of Large Language Models, so we can automatically direct your requests to the most appropriate AI for your particular request (based on data sensitivity, context window, cost, etc.)
4. We get sensible MSA's in place with all major external providers, so your data cannot be retained for more than 30 days or used to train models.

name: Layup
description: AI that builds workflows across company apps
extended_description:
Layup is every employee’s AI-powered sidekick that enables them to initiate instant, customized workflows for their everyday tasks. With just one prompt, we help them do things like create an MSA with data from Salesforce, export it to Google Docs, and instantly share it with the right people. ⛹🏻‍♂️⛹🏾‍♀️

We're on a mission to help individuals and organizations streamline their daily tasks with simple prompts so that they can focus on what matters most. And – we integrate with over 170 applications (and counting!), providing seamless configuration with any company’s knowledge base.

name: Doctor Droid
description: Your best friend in production.
extended_description:
Doctor Droid is a real-time analytics platform to monitor critical product workflows and identify the root cause of any issue.

Here's a short (demo)[https://www.loom.com/share/e45bc3551cdd43058f819cf5d47ffeec] of how Doctor Droid works.

name: Syncly
description: AI to automatically analyze all your customer emails
extended_description: We help revenue operations and customer success teams to reduce churn by automatically analyzing their email communication. Our team previously founded and sold a $200M AI technology startup.

name: AvenHQ
description: Shopify for professional service firms
extended_description: AvenHQ is the all-in-one platform for professional service firms to manage their client relationships - from onboarding to payments. Accountants, lawyers, agencies, and freelancers use AvenHQ to serve their clients.

name: Versori
description: Enterprise Integration & Workflow Automation
extended_description:
Versori Switchboard which allows any person, regardless of their technical level to develop and build their integrations, migrations, workflows and transformations all in one clean platform. 

Enabling medium to large enterprises to cut extensive costs and timeframes when it comes to large data processing events, Versori is to become synonymous with critical data infrastructure.

name: Trigger.dev
description: The open source background jobs framework for Typescript
extended_description:
Create background jobs directly in your codebase with features like API integrations, webhooks, scheduling and delays.

Previously, the founders built JSON Hero, an open source JSON viewer that is currently used by more than 35k developers a month. Eric was CTO of Code School, an early code learning platform that was acquired in 2015. Matt created two iPad apps that won Apple’s App of the Year.

name: rift
description: Cold outbound that doesn't land in spam.
extended_description:
rift lets sales and growth teams close more deals, without landing in spam. We do this by combining email automation and deliverability in a single product.

You need to do two things to effectively sell over email:
1. Set up your cold email infrastructure correctly.
2. Send relevant sales emails to the right people. 

rift does it all for you in a single platform. You don’t need to be an expert in email deliverability or cold outbound. 

Our product implements the email infrastructure for you, so you can focus only on growing your business. We will work with you 1:1 on writing sales emails that actually get replies.

name: Traceloop
location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
description: Observability and testing for your LLM application
extended_description: Traceloop monitors the quality of your LLM application in production. It provides you with alerts, insights and gradual rollout capabilities to confidently deploy changes to your prompts and model configurations.

name: Matano
description: Cloud Native SIEM (alternative to Splunk/Elastic)
extended_description:
Matano is a modern SIEM, built for cloud-first security teams. 

It replaces traditional SIEM databases like Splunk or Elastic with a cybersecurity platform built on top of a cost-effective Security Data Lake.

name: Cardinal
description: Your AI product backlog
extended_description: Cardinal is an opinionated feature backlog. It pulls in your customer feedback, CRM data, and task management issues and uses AI to assess which customers want which features, how important is it for them, and how much are they worth

name: Linum
description: Midjourney for Video
extended_description:
Linum is Midjourney for Video. We let anyone turn an idea into a movie.

Over the next ten years, we’re going to witness a shift in animation, tv, and film similar to what we’ve seen with YouTube - where most content will be generated by everyday people. At Linum, we’re using AI to build the tools that will enable this transition.

Linum was founded by Sahil Chopra and Manu Chopra - two brothers with 10 years of AI experience. Sahil co-wrote Stanford’s graduate-course on LLMs (Large Language Models). Manu trained RL (Reinforcement Learning) models for anesthesia administration at UCSF. 

We launched a private beta in February 2023, with individual users spending 5-10 hours making videos every week.

name: OneText
description: Frictionless payments via SMS
extended_description:
OneText is disrupting SMS marketing and payments. We win incremental sales for direct to consumer brands by making every purchase as effortless as paying with your hotel room number. OneText shoppers literally reply and buy with one text.

In our first year, we’ve onboarded 50 fast-growing e-commerce brands and have added as much as 14% in incremental revenue to their bottom lines. In March, we generated $597,000 dollars in payments. In April, we’ll book $50,000 dollars in revenue. 

Founders Jonathan Fudem/CEO and Daniel Brain/CTO met at PayPal Checkout where we designed and launched some of the world’s best checkout experiences. We left PayPal to build a payments company that actually helps merchants acquire customers and win sales.

The CMO of our largest customer, a $90M clothing brand, says we have revolutionized marketing for his company, and are, quote: “the best thing that’s happened to SMS marketing in forever.”

We are excited to share what you can do with OneText.

name: Reflex
description: Web apps in pure Python.
extended_description:
Reflex is an open-source, full-stack python framework that makes it easy to build and deploy web apps in minutes. It offers the ease of use and accessibility of low-code frameworks, combined with the flexibility, performance, and customizability of traditional web development. Reflex is open-source and designed to be easy to get started with for those with no previous web development experience.   

With Reflex, data scientists and software engineers can create high-quality web applications quickly and easily without needing to learn specific web development technologies. Whether you want to build a small-scale data science project/internal app, or a large-scale multi-page web app, Reflex has the tools and features to handle any project. The framework is optimized for performance, scalability, and SEO, so you can focus on creating a beautiful and engaging web app that you can be proud of.

name: Blyss
description: Leakproof data warehouse, built on homomorphic encryption.
extended_description:
Blyss is a leakproof data warehouse that lets companies store and analyze sensitive data without ever decrypting it. This has long been considered the ‘holy grail’ of security, and after decades of research, it’s finally here - and we helped invent it.

Data sent into Blyss is permanently sealed; once it enters, it's never decrypted. All analysis happens directly on the encrypted data. Regulated enterprises can use Blyss to unlock value from sensitive data without risking leaks.

The company is founded by two Stanford engineers, Samir and Neil, who have extensive background in cryptography and high-performance computing, and previously worked at Apple, Yubico, and NVIDIA.

name: Miracle
description: Speed up clinical trials by connecting trial data sources into 1 view
extended_description: Miracle helps biotech/pharma companies automatically integrate reports from CROs and data from enrollment systems (i.e. CTMS, EDC) into a real-time, single pane of glass. We empower biotechs' in-house Clinical Operations teams to better manage CROs/sites/vendors, share a sense of urgency, and ensure timely trial completion. We are a team of MIT engineers, data scientists, and former healthcare professionals who have experienced the pain of clinical trials first-hand.

name: Shyp

extended_description:
Shyp is an online marketplace which helps businesses move freight in India.

Before Shyp, businesses used to manually call multiple brokers to find trucks to move their loads. With Shyp, truck owners use our app to instantly discover loads and businesses get directly matched with truckers.

We are committed to driving growth in the Indian logistics industry and continue to innovate and improve our platform to meet the evolving needs of our customers. Reach out at founders@shyp.co.in if you're interested in joining us on this journey!

name: Blocksfabrik

extended_description:
Blocksfabrik automatically generates interface components - such as colors, buttons and inputs - using only the company’s design guidelines. 

Companies use us to help front-end developers ship faster, and ensure they’re always working with the latest designs, saving 100s of thousands of dollars in the process.

name: Stack AI
description: The AI Automation Platfrom
extended_description:
With Stack, any organization can build and deploy applications with LLMs in minutes. Our software provides an interface to easily apply AI for searching through knowledge bases, automating workflows, and building chatbots. 

Hundreds of companies use Stack AI to build custom knowledge base co-pilots, automate customer support, scrape data from the internet, and analyze large volumes of documents.

name: Middleware
description: AI-based full stack observability platform
extended_description:
Middleware is a full-stack cloud observability platform. We allow the dev and ops teams to debug the issue faster by bringing all the metrics, logs, traces, and events to a single unified timeline and train data to AI so it can give better insight into infrastructure and application.  

- Single command installation to collect all the metrics, logs, traces, and events.
- AI-based anomaly and error detection 
- GPT 4-based error resolution
- Support Infrastructure monitoring, Logs, APM, Kubernetes Monitoring, Synthetic Monitoring, Custom dashboard, and Alerts. 
- Full-stack observability, observe any stack at any scale.

We are at Middleware and wanted to make cloud observability faster, cheaper, and better.

name: Infisical
description: Open-source, end-to-end encrypted secrets manager for developers
extended_description:
Infisical is an open-source, end-to-end encrypted platform to manage secrets and configs across your team and infrastructure.

Infisical stores your secrets and injects them back into your development workflow, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud infrastructure. It comes with secrets versioning, point-in-time recovery, audit logging, automatic secret rotation capabilities, and more.

name: Avoca
description: AI-powered communications platform for SMBs
extended_description: We’re equipping every SMB with our intelligent 24/7 customer communications platform so business owners can get back to focusing on their core business. We handle both inbound interest in the form of calls, texts, and emails as well as outbound communications in the form of booking reminders, review requests, and future follow-ups.

name: Rubbrband
description: Evaluation for AI-generated images
extended_description:
Rubbrband is building an AI that qualitatively evaluates images at scale. For example, you can search "find all images featuring people with 6 fingers" from millions of images you provide.
 
The company is founded by a team of ML researchers from UC Berkeley: Abhinav Gopal, Darren Hsu, and Jeremy Lee.  https://rubbrband.com

name: Nucleus
description: The Business Phone powered by LLMs
extended_description:
We help SMBs qualify prospects, generate more leads, and ultimately close more customers. Our AI phone system makes outbound call campaigns to pre-qualify prospects and brings the high intent ones to you.

Today SMBs spend hours per day on lead generations and qualifying these leads. Nucleus' human-like Voice AI brings that time down to just 10 minutes. Simply import prospects, write a qualification script, and run the campaign.

name: Sameday
description: AI sales agents for home service businesses
extended_description: Home service businesses, like plumbers and roofers, are losing millions of dollars each year by failing to answer the phone. Sameday's AI Sales Agent answers any calls they otherwise would miss and will follow up until every lead is on the schedule.

name: Chima
description: Building infrastructure tools to help large companies customize their…
extended_description: Companies struggle to customize their generative AI models by taking advantage of their existing customer and enterprise data, in real-time. Chima solves for this through a sleek, interoperable layer before the standard generative AI models are applied.

name: Lavo Life Sciences
description: AI for drug formulation
extended_description: Lavo Life Sciences runs simulations of drug molecules on computers. Pharma companies use these simulations to guide their experiments and ultimately save time and money in the lab. This will de-risk and expedite clinical trials and FDA approval.

name: AlphaWatch AI
description: AI copilot for hedge funds with trusted data
extended_description:
AlphaWatch AI is a research and analysis platform designed for hedge funds and private equity firms. By using custom LLMs, specialized embedding models, and integrating with both trusted external data sources and secure private data, AlphaWatch AI offers a reliable chat interface that cites its sources, saving financial professionals time on research. 

We aim to solve a very real pain point: data is currently disjointed, and hedge funds spend anywhere from 250k to 1M on data costs. While LLMs should solve a research problem, their results are prone to hallucinations and don't include internal information.

With efficient data integration and valuable insights, AlphaWatch AI is enhancing the way financial institutions access essential information and make informed decisions while maintaining data privacy

name: Unify
description: Accelerate Your AI With One Line of Code
extended_description: We're on a mission to unify all ML frameworks, and enable automatic code conversions between frameworks.

name: Electric Air
description: The Tesla of heat pumps
extended_description:
Electric Air is combining modern heat pump technology with air quality management to bring the best heating and cooling experience to homeowners while saving them money. We also streamline the purchase, finance and install process with a direct to consumer online sales funnel. 

By integrating across hardware, software and sales, Electric Air offers a system with many advantages:
- An efficient, inverter driven heat pump provides all electric heating and cooling, and continues to perform well even in cold climates.
- Contractor software enables accurate sizing of heat pumps, and qualifies more homes for centrally ducted installs. 
- Our thermostat incorporates time-of-use rate plans, weather and grid conditions to reduce monthly utility bills. 
- Particulate and CO2 sensors in the thermostat trigger HEPA filtration as well as fresh air intake. 
- Humidity is perfectly balanced at the air handler by a central humidifier and the indoor heat exchanger.

name: OpenSight
description: AI-powered customer support automation for fast-growing companies
extended_description: OpenSight helps companies quickly scale up their support function and resolve customers' questions much faster. With the latest advancement in LLMs, OpenSight offers accurate answers and action resolution paths resolving >70% of inbound customer inquiries.

name: Mogara
description: Automatic software R&D capitalization
extended_description:
Mogara automates software R&D capitalization.

We replace accounting leaders chasing down engineers for timesheets with software that plugs directly into the developer workflow.

name: Salvy
description: Mobile carrier for businesses in Brazil
extended_description:
Salvy is revolutionizing the telecommunications landscape in Brazil by offering the first intelligent mobile carrier solution designed specifically for businesses. In a market dominated by just three companies that control a staggering 98% of the B2C and B2B telecom sectors, Salvy adopts a SaaS model to redefine the traditional mobile carrier experience. 

With Salvy, hiring and managing business phones gets super simple. We deliver full autonomy and transparency, so teams can easily manage their sales and field operations.

name: Collate
description: The AI dashboard to unify and grok unstructured B2B customer data.
extended_description: Collate is the all-in-one dashboard to understand your customers in a single pane, starting with GTM teams. It aggregates unstructured data across tools like Slack, Notion, and Zoom and uses AI to automatically summarize customer context and generate the highest ROI action items.

name: Artisan AI
description: Creating the first human-like digital workers, called Artisans
extended_description:
Artisans are advanced human-like digital workers trained to do specific roles, who integrate alongside human teams. They have unique faces, names, memories & skills, and they continuously improve once they are employed, molding to each company's needs.

Our first Artisan, Ava, automates the entire outbound sales process and can be set up with a 10-minute conversation. Ava creates TCPs, prospects with her database of over 270,000,000 contacts, crafts & sends highly bespoke email sequences, and books meetings into your calendar. And, you can manage all features & settings by talking to Ava via Slack. 

Next year, we'll release a workforce of Artisans, including the Graphic Designer and Marketing Manager. Each Artisan works both with our native feature-rich software and popular external platforms.

We're not creating another SaaS product for teams to use, we're creating new team members. 

This is the next Industrial Revolution.

name: Buster
description: Build LLM-powered dashboards into your product
extended_description:
Buster gives product teams the UI components, frameworks, and infrastructure to rapidly build self-serve reporting features into their customer-facing products.

With Buster, your customers can ask data questions in plain english and generate charts, reports, etc. They can then save these charts to their own dashboard - without ever leaving your web app.

name: Vectorview
description: Analytics to improve RAG powered LLM products
extended_description: Get insights into user behaviour and model performance by automatically grouping questions and evaluating LLM answers. Optimize your RAG pipeline by understanding how your embedded documents are used. Improve your LLM app, monitor performance and prevent hallucinations.

name: ion design
description: We automatically convert Figma designs into clean React code
extended_description:
Ion automatically converts Figma designs into clean react code to speed up front-end engineers.

We use AI to understand your codebase and generate code within the context of your design systems and styling libraries. We also incorporate your existing components to your generations to ensure high code quality.

name: Duckie AI
description: AI software development companion that gets your work done.
extended_description:
Duckie is a platform that lets engineers manage a team of AI software development companions (Ducklings) that get their dev work done.

Ducklings work with engineers to complete end-to-end feature development, from design to implementation. Ducklings chat with users to define their goals, come up with engineering designs, and generate code.

name: Onboard AI
description: Private, secure AI subject-matter expert on any codebase
extended_description:
Onboard lets you chat with any codebase of up to 10 repos to locate and understand functionality, diagnose bugs, generate complex code changes and more. 

It is ChatGPT with real-time updated knowledge of your codebase, as well as any public/open-source library. 

You can start using Onboard with just two clicks - just sign-in with GitHub and paste-in the name of any GitHub repo. 

Onboard can also be hosted 100% on your cloud, including the AI models, so not a single line of your code ever leaves your cloud.

name: Leya
description: An honest AI assistant for lawyers
extended_description:
Leya is an AI assistant designed for legal professionals, adept at answering complex legal questions and optimizing workflows. By integrating laws, cases, and regulations, Leya delivers reliable, source-cited answers and allows lawyers to start using gen AI today.

Already in use at top-tier law firms aiming to stay ahead of the game, Leya is open for early access.

name: Upsolve AI
description: Your AI Copilot for DataOps & Data Analytics
extended_description: Upsolve’s AI contextualize your data and make it ‘AI ready’ with institutional business and data knowledge, allowing you to get insights from your data with plain English. Subsequently, Upsolve act as the collaboration layer to transform these analytics into data product. Using Upsolve, you can deliver embedded analytics to your end users in day one!

name: AgentHub
description: A no-code platform for automating workflows with AI
extended_description:
AgentHub is a platform for automating repetitive and complex workflows end-to-end with AI. 

Builders drag, drop, and connect modular components onto a canvas to build powerful automations.

We provide the tools and the infrastructure to operate at 10x the speed of writing, testing, and productionizing code so you can focus on the problem at hand.

name: Lantern
description: PostgreSQL vector database extension to build AI applications

name: GovernGPT
description: Compliance 'Grammarly'
extended_description:
GovernGPT reviews Marketing Materials in Real-Time using AI, like"Grammarly" but for Compliance. 

Content reviews in investment management are time-intensive, full of heavy back and forth, repeat mistakes, and inconsistency leading to slowdowns for marketing & delayed publication to investors. This process is frustrating for both author & reviewer while being a key focus of regulators such as SEC.
